wikipedia_page.main: Alan Morton (born 6 March 1942) is an English former professional footballer who scored 28 goals from 94 appearances in the Football League playing as an inside forward for Peterborough United, Lincoln City and Chesterfield.

response: Alan Morton (1893–1971) was a Scottish international footballer of the 1920s and 1930s.
Alan Morton may also refer to:
*Alan Morton (footballer, born 1942), English footballer (Peterborough United, Lincoln City and Chesterfield FC)
*Alan Morton (footballer, born 1950), English footballer (Stockport County, Fulham FC and Wimbledon FC)
